text:
Travel Consul welcomed in the Affiliate Membership Program of UNWTO Published on : Friday, October 2, 2015
The United Nations World Tourism Organization (UNWTO) welcomed Travel Consul as a member of its Affiliate Membership Program during its recent General Assembly held in Medellin, Colombia. Travel Consul is a fast-growing international marketing communications alliance consisting of advertising, brand strategy, public relations, digital, media and marketing firms spread across the globe – all specializing in travel.
An official agency of the United Nations, UNWTO is the leading international organization in the field of tourism. It promotes tourism as a driver of economic growth, inclusive development and environmental sustainability and offers leadership and support to the sector in advancing knowledge and tourism policies worldwide. UNWTO’s Affiliate Membership Program encourages active participation from global public and private sector entities who contribute expertise toward the organization’s goals.
“We are pleased to join UNWTO’s affiliate program and have the opportunity to share our expertise in marketing tourism globally,” said Don Montague, Partner of Travel Consul. “We share the UNWTO’s view in addition to its goals that tourism requires local expertise in both the private and public sectors to truly make an impact and effect social change in a global industry that is one of the world’s biggest economic drivers.”
One in five UNWTO affiliate members is a global organization with presence in all continents. Travel Consul was created as a global alliance of local tourism marketing experts willing and able to work seamlessly as a single team. Experts in 23 offices around the world are all able to provide research, integrated marketing solutions and comprehensive dashboard-based measurement designed specifically for travel and tourism brands.
By working with the Travel Consul network, clients receive global expertise, strategy and resources combined with local market execution. Each agency partner is a recognized thought leader within the travel and tourism industry in their respective market and has extensive knowledge of trends and their implications affecting tourism and hospitality industries worldwide. In return, clients benefit from greater consistency in delivering their messages, financial and operational efficiencies in executing their marketing programs and preparedness working across international markets.
Travel Consul is rapidly growing and already able to support UNWTO and its affiliates from our offices in: New York, Kansas City, Orlando, Honolulu, Toronto, Panama City, Sao Paulo, Rio de Janeiro, Brasilia, Buenos Aires, Santiago de Chile, Bogota, Quito, London, Paris, Madrid, Milan, Moscow, Beijing, Shanghai, Xi’an, Tokyo, Mexico DF.
Travel Consul’s member agency in USA is MMGY Global.
